data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Santiago del Estero, Argentina that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santiago del Estero, Argentina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Santiago del Estero, Argentina humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary: On average, 124 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Santiago del Estero, Argentina.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Please, teach the 88,921 believers in Santiago del Estero, Argentina how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Santiago del Estero, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people might believe through him.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Santiago del Estero to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, help the 88,921 believers in Santiago del Estero to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santiago del Estero, Argentina has a population of 804,500.

We estimate Santiago del Estero has 88,921 people who might know Jesus, 660,138 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 55,441 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Santiago del Estero.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
